LanguageData.TribalDemandPigeon: {1} have just sent a pigeon. They inform you that they are holding former colonist {PAWN_labelShort} for ransom.\n\nThey're willing to release {PAWN_objective} back to you in exchange for {2} silver.
LanguageData.TribalDemandSignalfire: You see smoke-signals coming from {1}. They say that you that they are holding former colonist {PAWN_labelShort} for ransom.\n\nThey're willing to release {PAWN_objective} back to you in exchange for {2} silver.
